Name: Été Anisé
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with tonic water. Special ingredient #1 : Sour orange mix
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Campari by Jan & Hannah Van Ongevalle in Belgium.
Garnish: Dehydrated orange slice, star anise & edible flowers
